A4.text: The battle took place south and east of the Belgian city of Ypres in West Flanders.

A5.text: Passchendaele (now Passendale) lies on the last ridge east of Ypres, 5 mi (8 km) from Roulers (now Roeselare)

A6.text: Passchendaele, a town in Belgium and a World War I battlefield site

A7.text: the Passchendaele Ridge east of the city

A8.text: Passchendaele (now Passendale) lies on the last ridge east of Ypres
